params.search_space_default_greeting:
Welcome to 🔭 Search Space! Here are some nifty features to play with:

* 💡 Suggestions are a thing. Start typing, and you will see what I mean.
* ❤️ Emojis are valid search terms. How often do you [😂](?q=😂), [😭](?q=😭), or read [📚](?q=📚)?
* 🔗 You can link to search results like [*this*](?q=this).
* 🪆 Searching for [*mac*](?q=mac) will return results like *Mac*Book and *mac*hine.
* 💬 Replies are indexed, try searching people's usernames to find conversations you had with them.
* 🎙️ Podcast transcripts are indexed as well!

P.S. Search Space is a passion project! Built by [@sod](https://micro.blog/sod) and released to the world for free. Find it useful? 💸 [Donate $10](https://dahlstrand.net/donate/) or any amount you're comfortable with. Thanks! 🙏
